entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
